item.title: [tut]making talking NPCS
item.dc:creator: @philip_l_g philip_l_g
item.description:
@philip_l_g wrote:

i dont know if this has been posted on theese forums i regestered on so many for private servers:

Open NPChandler.java and then search for moo! and this should come up:

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
						}
					}

now after that last } add this:

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
						if (misc.random2(20) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "graah!!!";
						}
					}

that makes that big jad thingy say “graah!!!” to change the npc that says this replace 2745 (at the top of code) with the npc ID you want and to change the message change Graah!!! in the code but keep the " "

Read full topic
